content.runesDescription: Runes are stones that enhance items with socketed slots. They add various properties depending on the item type. When inserted in the correct order, they form runewords that give items new properties.

row1:
Weapon: +50 to Attack Rating, +1 to Light Radius
Helmet/Armor: +15 to Defense, +1 to Light Radius
Shield: +15 to Defense, +1 to Light Radius
row2:
Weapon: +75% Damage to Undead,
+50 to Attack Rating against Undead
Helmet/Armor: 15% slower stamina drain
Shield: 7% increased chance of blocking
row3:
Weapon: +2 to Mana after each Kill
Helmet/Armor: +2 to Mana after each Kill
Shield: +2 to Mana after each Kill
row4:
Weapon: +10% Enhanced Damage
Helmet/Armor: +10% Enhanced Defense
Shield: +10% Enhanced Defense
row5:
Weapon: +1 to Strength
Helmet/Armor: -15% Requirements
Shield: -15% Requirements
row6:
Weapon: +10% to Maximum Damage
Helmet/Armor: +15 to Strength
Shield: +15 to Strength
row7:
Weapon: +3 to Energy
Helmet/Armor: +5 to Mana
Shield: +5 to Mana
row8:
Weapon: +5 to Energy
Helmet/Armor: +5 to Energy
Shield: +5 to Energy
row9:
Weapon: +10 to Energy
Helmet/Armor: +10 to Mana
Shield: +10 to Mana
row10:
Weapon: +15 to Energy
Helmet/Armor: +10 to Defense
Shield: +10 to Defense
row11:
Weapon: +10% Life Steal
Helmet/Armor: +20% to Life Steal
Shield: +20% to Life Steal
row12:
Weapon: +10 to Strength
Helmet/Armor: +10 to Strength
Shield: +10 to Strength
row13:
Weapon: +10 to Dexterity
Helmet/Armor: +10 to Dexterity
Shield: +10 to Dexterity
row14:
Weapon: +10 to Vitality
Helmet/Armor: +10 to Vitality
Shield: +10 to Vitality
row15:
Weapon: -10 to Minimum Damage
Helmet/Armor: +5% Damage Reduction
Shield: +5% Damage Reduction
row16:
Weapon: +5% Life Steal
Helmet/Armor: +5% Life Steal
Shield: +5% Life Steal
row17:
Weapon: +1 to all Skills
Helmet/Armor: +1 to all Skills
Shield: +1 to all Skills
row18:
Weapon: +5% Mana Steal
Helmet/Armor: +5% Mana Steal
Shield: +5% Mana Steal
row19:
Weapon: +15% Enhanced Damage
Helmet/Armor: +15% Enhanced Damage
Shield: +15% Enhanced Damage
row20:
Weapon: +25% Enhanced Damage
Helmet/Armor: +25% Enhanced Damage
Shield: +25% Enhanced Damage
row21:
Weapon: +5% to Maximum Damage
Helmet/Armor: +5% to Maximum Damage
Shield: +5% to Maximum Damage
row22:
Weapon: +15% to all Resistances
Helmet/Armor: +15% to all Resistances
Shield: +15% to all Resistances
row23:
Weapon: 9% chance to find magical items
Helmet/Armor: -15% to requirements
Shield: -15% to requirements
row24:
Weapon: +5-15% to skills
Helmet/Armor: +5-15% to skills
Shield: +5-15% to skills
row25:
Weapon: 10% chance for additional damage
Helmet/Armor: -20% to mana costs
Shield: -20% to mana costs
row26:
Weapon: +10% to Life
Helmet/Armor: +10% to Life
Shield: +10% to Life
row27:
Weapon: 50% chance to destroy target
Helmet/Armor: +50% to Vitality
Shield: +50% to Vitality
row28:
Weapon: 100% to additional damage
Helmet/Armor: +75% to damage
Shield: +75% to damage
row29:
Weapon: +200% to damage
Helmet/Armor: +200% to damage
Shield: +200% to damage
row30:

Helmet/Armor: +100% to maximum damage
Shield: +100% to maximum damage
row31:

Shield: +200% to damage
row33:
Weapon: Indestructible
Helmet/Armor: Indestructible
Shield: Indestructible

content.runewordsDescription: Runewords are special combinations of runes that you can insert into socketed items. By choosing the right runes and placing them in a specific order, you can give your items new properties.

runeword1:
+2 to All Skills
25-35% Faster Cast Rate
55% Faster Hit Recovery
1-50 Lightning Damage
3-14 Cold Damage
75 Poison Damage over 5 Seconds
7% Life Stolen Per Hit
+250 Defense vs. Missiles
+22 to Vitality
89-112 Mana
3-8% Magic Absorb
runeword2:
+2 to All Skills
25-35% Faster Cast Rate
55% Faster Hit Recovery
+250 Defense vs. Missiles
+22 to Vitality
89-112 Mana
3-8% Magic Absorb
+35% Cold Resistance
+35% Lightning Resistance
+35% Poison Resistance
Attacker Takes Damage of 14
runeword3:
+2 to All Skills
45% Faster Run/Walk
+1 to Teleport
+750-775 Defense
+0-74 Strength (based on character level)
Increase Maximum Life 5%
Damage Reduced by 8%
14 Life After Each Kill
15% Damage Taken Goes to Mana
1-99% Better Chance of Getting Magic Items (based on character level)
runeword4:
50% Chance to Cast Level 20 Chain Lightning When You Kill an Enemy
Level 12 Conviction Aura When Equipped
35% Faster Run/Walk
255-325% Enhanced Damage
-55% to Enemy Lightning Resistance
40% Chance of Crushing Blow
Prevent Monster Heal
0.5-49.5 Vitality (based on character level)
30% Better Chance of Getting Magic Items
Level 21 Cyclone Armor (30 Charges)
runeword5:
Level 12-17 Meditation Aura When Equipped
35% Faster Cast Rate
200-260% Enhanced Damage
+9 to Minimum Damage
180-250% Bonus to Attack Rating
5-30 Fire Damage
75 Poison Damage over 5 Seconds
+1-6 to Critical Strike
+5 to All Attributes
+2 to Mana After Each Kill
23% Better Chance of Getting Magic Items
runeword6:
25% Faster Run/Walk
25% Faster Cast Rate
25% Faster Hit Recovery
+6 to Dexterity
Regenerate Mana 15%
+15 to Maximum Stamina
Poison Resist +30%
Magic Damage Reduced by 3
runeword7:
+1 to All Skills
40% Increased Attack Speed
250-290% Enhanced Damage
Adds 5-30 Fire Damage
7% Life Stolen Per Hit
+2-6 to Battle Command
+1-6 to Battle Orders
+1-4 to Battle Cry
Prevent Monster Heal
Replenish Life +12
30% Better Chance of Getting Magic Items
runeword8:
+1 to All Skills
+10 to Energy
+2 to Mana After Each Kill
+30% Lightning Resist
Damage Reduced by 7
+2 to Light Radius
